name: Rock Paper Scissors (ODDIN)
description:
This is my first game made in Unity.

Just a simple rock paper scissor game, nothing more. Please be my guest to leave any comments. Likes, dislikes, critiques are very welcomed. 

Thanks to Ville Nousiainen from freesound.org for providing a bgm. Here is a link to authors page: http://soundcloud.com/mutkanto

Please enjoy and thanks to everyone who plays it!
